thread.title: Nicola Sturgeon told by Brussels bigwigs Scotland CANNOT stay in the EU, Ukip claims
thread.title_full: Nicola Sturgeon told by Brussels bigwigs Scotland CANNOT stay in the EU, Ukip claims

title: Nicola Sturgeon told by Brussels bigwigs Scotland CANNOT stay in the EU, Ukip claims
text:
GETTY Ukip MEP David Coburn claimed Martin Schulz revealed Scotland cannot join the EU 
“Britain came in as one country and it has to leave as such. He doesn’t want the Balkanisation of the UK. 
He added: “What she is saying is tosh, she’s misleading the Scottish people. It’s just not possible.” GETTY The ex-Brussels bigwig allegedly said Sturgeon had not agreed any single market access I had a meeting with President Schulz and he said quite clearly, and he’d just had a meeting with her, and he did not agree to anything David Coburn 
The 58-year-old claimed Sturgeon’s chances of Scottish independence would be dashed once Britain leaves the clutches of the bureaucratic Brussels bloc which is why she is so determined to muddy the waters surrounding Brexit. 
He added: “We do four times as much business with the rest of the UK than with the EU. Scottish people are starting to tweak.” 
Mr Coburn also urged Theresa May to reject any calls from Sturgeon to hold another Scottish independence referendum. PA David Coburn told the Express.co.uk Sturgeon's plans are tosh 
“Scotland will lose a lot of jobs due to unease. What’s going to happen in the future. What’s the currency going to be? It’s nonsense. 
“If Scotland did reapply for EU membership, it would have to adopt the euro, which brings a whole bucket of problems. 
“We’d have to create a central bank and square a £15billion budget deficit. Look what they did to Greece. They crushed Greece and hit them with austerity. Scotland would be hit with even bigger austerity. They are lost and desperately trying to change the situation.” UKIP MEP Paul Nuttall visits the Roma ghetto in Sofia Wed, February 1, 2017
